thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Carmelo Echeverria
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Carmelo Echeverria

author: Carmelo Echeverria
title: Carmelo Echeverria
text: After almost 9 years with American Home Shield, I am so happy another choice existed and to make the decision to switch. What a pleasant surprise. The people who answer that telephone speak with you like they do care, the service requested is in your house in less than 24 hours, I am so impressed. Keep this great service and new customers will be coming to you daily, I am already your number one advertiser.
